titleStmt.title: Pauls soul panting for a better life a sermon preached at Lotherstock in the county of Northampton, Jan. 25, 1654, at the funeral of that faithful servant in Christ, Master John Bellamy ... : with a brief narration of his life and death / by Richard Resbury ...
titleStmt.author: Resbury, Richard, 1607-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. and are to be sold by Tho. Newberry ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
